mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID AS userId ,D.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS "department.departmentName" , U.NAME AS name , P.POSITION_NAME AS "position.positionName" ,U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH AS profileImgPath FROM GROUVY_USERS U, GROUVY_DEPARTMENTS D, GROUVY_POSITIONS P WHERE U.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID AND U.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO AND U.DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentNo} AND U.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND U.USER_ID != #{userId} ORDER BY P.POSITION_NO ASC

SELECT U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH AS profileImgPath ,U.NAME AS name , P.POSITION_NAME AS "position.positionName" , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS "department.departmentName" , U.PHONE_NUMBER AS phoneNumber , U.EMAIL AS email , U.USER_ID AS userId FROM GROUVY_USERS U, GROUVY_DEPARTMENTS D, GROUVY_POSITIONS P WHERE U.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID AND U.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO AND U.USER_ID = #{userId} AND U.IS_DELETED = 'N'

SELECT R.ROOM_ID AS roomId ,R.IS_GROUP AS isGroup FROM GROUVY_CHAT_ROOMS R, GROUVY_CHAT_ROOM_USERS U WHERE R.ROOM_ID = U.ROOM_ID AND R.IS_GROUP = 'N' AND U.USER_ID IN(#{userId},#{selectUserId}) GROUP BY R.ROOM_ID, R.IS_GROUP HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT U.USER_ID) = 2

SELECT M.CHAT_MESSAGE_ID AS chatMessageId ,M.ROOM_ID AS roomId ,M.SENDER_ID AS senderId ,M.CHAT_MESSAGE_CONTENT AS content ,M.CHAT_MESSAGE_TYPE AS messageType ,M.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate ,U.NAME AS "user.name" ,U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH AS "user.profileImgPath" FROM GROUVY_CHAT_MESSAGES M , GROUVY_USERS U WHERE M.SENDER_ID = U.USER_ID AND M.CHAT_MESSAGE_ID = #{chatMessageId}

SELECT M.CHAT_MESSAGE_ID AS chatMessageId ,M.ROOM_ID AS roomId ,M.SENDER_ID AS senderId ,M.CHAT_MESSAGE_CONTENT AS content ,M.CHAT_MESSAGE_TYPE AS messageType ,M.CREATED_DATE AS createdDate ,U.NAME AS "user.name" ,U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH AS "user.profileImgPath" FROM GROUVY_CHAT_MESSAGES M,GROUVY_USERS U WHERE U.USER_ID = M.SENDER_ID AND M.ROOM_ID = #{roomId} ORDER BY M.CREATED_DATE ASC
